issue.title: [R] Proxy support for S3 File systems
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14566](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14566). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There is no http proxy support for s3 files systems, for R – or at least I cannot see how to configure it.

Ideally, the HTTP_PROXY and HTTPS_PROXY environment variables are used by default, with option to override via parameters to `S3FileSystem$create()`.
